mapper.insert: insert into IOT_EQUIPMENT_PROPERTIES select sys_guid() as ID, EQU_ID, PRO_NAME_CN, PRO_NAME_EN, PRO_VALUE, STANDBY1, STANDBY2, STANDBY3 from IOT_EQUIPMENT_PROPERTIES_BACK WHERE BACK_ID = #{backId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
